duties_responsibilities.duty: Take ownership of the Java environment and contribute in all phases of the development lifecycle.
Design and develop high-volume, low-latency applications for mission-critical systems and deliver high-availability and performance.
Act as a subject matter expert in the code, mentor team members, set standards and best practices, focusing on quality and continuous delivery.
Implement efficient software to handle large quantities of data (billions of rows) and real-time streaming data (millions of messages per day).
Design DB Schema and develop SQL.
Utilize Java testing tools (Spock, Junit, Mockito) and continuous integration (Jenkins).
Use version control systems (Git, SVN) and show strong business acumen, analytical skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work as part of a team in a fast-paced environment.
Working knowledge of Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a plus.

education_certification.credential: A graduate-level education with a focus on computer science, mathematics, or engineering.
